file_content.text: We stand at the edge of victory. Now we must conquer.
You will be the first of my Terror Thralls. Your faces will be branded with symbols of victory!
I'll have artists start on the slaves, my lord. But our losses....
Our losses are nothing so long as the Republic weeps.
Join us, my shadow operative, as we celebrate!
I appreciate the invitation, but I have my duties.
I'm in a bit of a hurry.
More Republic troops are coming to Corellia. I found the data in Aegis Base.
More of the enemy are coming.
They will die just as easily.
Shed blood by day and revel by night.
Yes! We will walk among the ruins.
My lord? The other Sith are coming to council.
Then the celebrations must wait. Return to your work.
